message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $165?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $165 is a good compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $175. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $172.50.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I think I can do a bit better than $160. How about $165?

Hi Bob, I understand you're getting close to your budget, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $170. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $167.50.
I'm really close to my budget, and I think we're getting close to a deal. How about $162.50?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $168. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $164.
I'm really trying to make this work, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than $160. Can you meet me at $160?
